TopicTitle: The Game Crashed and I Lost Everything

Articles.Content: I had just begun assembling a space station in sandbox mode and I returned to the space center to build a new moduel, then 5 seconds later my game crashed for no apparent reason (this is the 12th time this has happened to me, and it usually happens when I am assembling a vehicle) then when I re-opened the game I found that all my data had been corrupted and I lost both of my saved games (one was a sandbox and the other was carrer) I have been dissapointed with this game ever sense I first purchased it and I CANNOT BELIEVE!!! that it costs $40 on the Playstation store, now that I have played it I wouldn't pay more than $20 for it. I have played this game on PC and it is very fun but WHY ON EARTH! would you release it on PS4 in this condition, it was a terrible Idea!!!!

I am sorry to hear of your lost game time man. 

 This has affected many console players, in fact it will after time affect every single console player.

 It is absolutely unacceptable I agree and for a full price game it is a farce. What can you do about it? 

 Not much. You could apply for a refund as it is clearly, in this state not fit for purpose or you could wait and see if they manage to fix it with a patch. FT have said they are working on a path but they have also said they cannot say when it will be released so you are, for now, stuck with a broken product..

Edited August 6, 2016 by Majorjim!

if you have PS+ and you have your settings so it will, your saves will periodically be uploaded to the cloud, you can get most of your progress back from those. saving and manually backing up regularly isnt a bad idea.
I purchased a flash drive just for backing up my game save. I do it each time before I start up the game. I lost everything within a few hours of starting previously as well.

Unfortunately, bugs happen, and Squad is not only aware of this issue, but they are working on a fix. The complications of approval and development time may seem incomprehensible, and you may feel wronged, but Squad is not against you on this one.

Be patient, or get a refund.
